body:
Overview

HackerRank for Work has pre-defined integrations with many popular off-the-shelf Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). These integrations make the recruiter workflow smoother because it allows the recruiters to order HackerRank for Work assessments from the ATS User Interface (UI).

The currently available ATS integrations are:

  1. Lever
  2. Greenhouse
  3. Jobvite
  4. Jazz
  5. Taleo
  6. SmartRecruiters
  7. iCIMS
  8. Avature
  9. Breezy
  10. Workable
  11. Workday
  12. Zoho Recruit
  13. Eightfold
  14. BrassRing
  15. Goodtime

Comparison of the Integrations

The different ATS integrations aim to make recruiters work simpler, but there are minor differences in how they work. Here is a comparative view of the different features, we have in the different ATS integrations:

For more information on this integration, refer to Add Candidates to ATS from Public Link 

Note: You can refer to our detailed API documents to learn more about the APIs.

New Integration Partner

If you are interested in an integration with HackerRank, please reach out to your HackerRank point of contact or support@hackerrank.com.
